name: Octoesp
body:
# ESP8266 Firmware for Octoblu

With this Firmware your ESP8266 can communicate with Octoblu

## Features

* mqtt connection to octoblu
* controlling WS2812 RGB LEDs
* ~~automatic updating~~ (in progress)

## Requirements

* [nodemcu](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware) firmware installed (> 0.9.5)
* [ESPlorer](http://esp8266.ru/esplorer/) or alternate uploader
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
